name: Friday Night Gachin' (2.0)
description:
ORIGINAL CREATOR: https://rawg.io/@gordoiteitch/games

Ever wanted to funk on gacha life but you could never do it? Well here's your chance!
This is Friday Night Funkin' but the twist is that its gacha club! Enjoy and I know there are lots of bugs so ill try to fix em'!
-CONTROLS-
WASD for misses, ARROWS for notes, l to die, t for thunder, p for pose, spacebar to switch characters , m to change background, and 9 for the beta bf icon!
Scratch link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/483236959/
Person that helped me make the game: https://itch.io/profile/wolfqueen69
